page.title: 12Portswood
page.content: This is a built up, inner city area situated north of the city centre. Portswood Rd. runs roughly North to South and is a busy route to the city with four bus services. Portswood is a mainly residential area with a majority of the housing being Victorian or Edwardian terraced houses. There is a mix of council and privately owned properties. Some houses have garages but many people have to park their cars in the road. Some demolition is taking place on the East side of Osbourne Rd. to make way for a road to link with the M3 motorway. Portswood Rd. is an important suburban shopping area with a variety of shops serving most needs, though there are not too many ladies clothing shops.
